title: Sizzling rice prawns with curried celery
description: This dramatic dish is sure to earn you compliments. It is moderately easy to make, but requires organisation and some experience of Chinese cooking. The key is that the prawn sauce and rice cake should both be fairly hot - you will then achieve a dramatic sizzle when the two are combined.
ingredients: 2-3 tsp groundnut oil, plus 1.2 litres/2 pints groundnut oil for deep-frying
1 tbsp cider vinegar or Chinese black rice vinegar
2 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
1 tbsp cornflour blended with 2 tbsp water to form a smooth paste
1 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
2 tbsp finely chopped spring onions, to garnish
1 tbsp finely chopped fresh coriander, to garnish
